about.summary: R is a free software environment for statistical computing and graphics.

name: r-base
raw_recipe:
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set version = '3.4.1' %}

package:
  name: r-base
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://cran.r-project.org/src/base/R-3/R-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 02b1135d15ea969a3582caeb95594a05e830a6debcdb5b85ed2d5836a6a3fc78
  patches:
    - mac-unicode.patch  # [osx]
    - 0002-Win32-Fix-trio-config-h-include-depth-issue.patch
    - 0003-Win32-Do-not-static-libgcc-link.patch              # This patch is only correct if using MSYS2's tcltk.
    - 0005-Win32-Extend-sqrt-NA_real_-hack-to-all-GCC-versions.patch
    - 0006-Win32-GCC-5.3-Fix-ISNAN-int-emits-UD2-insn.patch
    - 0007-Win32-MSYS2-ENV_CONV_EXCL_R_ARCH.patch
    - 0008-Darwin-set-DYLD_FALLBACK_LIBRARY_PATH.patch
    - 0009-R-3.3.0-Use-AC_SEARCH_LIBS-to-search-for-ncurses.patch
    - 0011-Linux-Do-not-modify-LD_LIBRARY_PATH.patch
    - 0012-macOS-include-cairo_h-not-cairo-xlib_h.patch
    - 0013-javareconf-do-not-fail-on-compile-fail.patch

build:
  number: 5
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/
  no_link:
    # These files are modified by R CMD javareconf and can
    # point to different Java implementations in each env.
    - lib/R/etc/Makeconf
    - lib/R/etc/ldpaths
    - lib/R/etc/javaconf
    - lib/R/etc/x64/Makeconf
    - lib/R/etc/x64/ldpaths
    - lib/R/etc/x64/javaconf
  detect_binary_files_with_prefix: true

requirements:
  build:
    - posix                    # [win]
    - m2-texinfo-tex           # [win]
    - m2-texinfo               # [win]
    - m2-curl                  # [win]
    - m2-p7zip                 # [win]
    - texlive-core             # [osx]
    - {{posix}}pkg-config
    - {{posix}}autoconf
    - {{posix}}automake-wrapper  # [win]
    - {{posix}}automake          # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('fortran') }}        # [unix]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_fortran') }}  # [win]
    - {{ compiler('c') }}        # [unix]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_c') }}  # [win]
  host:
    - readline                # [not win]
    - ncurses                 # [not win]
    - jpeg                     # [not win]
    - curl                                 # [not win]
    - xz                       # [not win]
    - libpng                      # [not win]
    - {{native}}bzip2 1.0.*    # [not osx]
    - {{native}}libjpeg-turbo  # [win]
    - {{native}}libiconv       # [win]
    - {{native}}gmp 6.1.*            # [win]
    - {{native}}fftw           # [win]
    - {{native}}xz             # [win]
    - {{native}}mpfr 3.1.*           # [win]
    - {{native}}libsndfile     # [win]
    - {{native}}bwidget        # [win]
    - {{native}}tktable        # [win]
    - {{native}}libpng         # [win]
    - {{native}}pango          # [not win]
    - {{native}}icu            # [not win]
    - {{native}}pcre 8.39*     # [not win]
    - {{native}}pcre           # [win]
    - {{native}}tk             # [win]
    - {{native}}tk             # [not win]
    - zlib         # [not win]
    - {{native}}zlib  # [win]
    - {{native}}gsl
    - libtiff                  # [not win]
    - {{native}}libtiff  # [win]
    - {{native}}libxml2 2.9.*

  run:
    - readline                # [not win]
    - ncurses                 # [not win]
    - jpeg                     # [not win]
    - curl                                 # [not win]
    - xz                       # [not win]
    - libpng                      # [not win]
    - {{native}}bzip2 1.0.*    # [not osx]
    - {{native}}libjpeg-turbo  # [win]
    - {{native}}libiconv       # [win]
    - {{native}}gmp 6.1.*            # [win]
    - {{native}}fftw           # [win]
    - {{native}}xz             # [win]
    - {{native}}mpfr 3.1.*           # [win]
    - {{native}}libsndfile     # [win]
    - {{native}}bwidget        # [win]
    - {{native}}tktable        # [win]
    - {{native}}libpng         # [win]
    - {{native}}pango          # [not win]
    - {{native}}icu            # [not win]
    - {{native}}pcre 8.39*     # [not win]
    - {{native}}pcre           # [win]
    - {{native}}tk             # [win]
    - {{native}}tk             # [not win]
    - zlib         # [not win]
    - {{native}}zlib  # [win]
    - {{native}}gsl
    - libtiff                  # [not win]
    - {{native}}libtiff  # [win]
    - {{native}}libxml2 2.9.*

test:
  commands:
    - R -h
    - R --version
    - Rscript --version
    - Rscript -e  'cat("ok\\n")'
    - open  # [win]
    # There doesn't seem to be a way to test this one
    # - RSetReg  # [win]
    - Rfe --help  # [win]
    - Rterm --help  # [win]
    - Rterm --version  # [win]
    - conda inspect linkages -p $PREFIX $PKG_NAME  # [not win]
    - conda inspect objects -p $PREFIX $PKG_NAME  # [osx]

about:
  home: http://www.r-project.org/
  license: GPL-3.0
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: COPYING
  summary: 'R is a free software environment for statistical computing and graphics.'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - johanneskoester
    - ocefpaf
    - sodre
    - bgruening

about.summary: R is a free software environment for statistical computing and graphics.
